description: This notice is seeking a supplier to deliver 14,020,500 rounds of 9mm Luger (9x19mm) 147 gr. Encapsulated Ammunition to various delivery points across Canada. Need the ammunition to be delivered within a one-year period, with an option for an additional three years. Includes a notice type description with miscellaneous information like contact information and contracting entity details.
duration_in_months: After 12 months, after an initial period of one year (option to extend) with option for 3 years maximum.
full_summary:
=====================================

### 9mm Luger (9x19mm) 147 gr. Encapsulated Ammunition Tender

#### Tender Details

* **Notice ID:** WS4450688569-Doc4478342830
* **Publication Date:** March 7, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** May 7, 2024, 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start:** May 30, 2024
* **Expected Contract End:** May 31, 2028

#### Tender Description
Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) has a requirement for the supply of 9mm Luger (9x19mm) 147 gr. Encapsulated Ammunition. The procurement is for 14,020,500 rounds over a period of one year, with an additional option period of three years. The requirement does not include any security criteria.

Deliveries of the ammunition will be made to various delivery points across Canada as specified in Appendix 1 to Annex A of the bid solicitation document. Firms intending to submit bids must obtain bid documents through CanadaBuys.ca at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities).

#### Contact Information
Contact:
Sebastian Ptasinskas (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: [sebastian.ptasinskas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sebastian.ptasinskas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Phone: Not applicable
Fax: Not applicable

#### Instructions for Bidders
All inquiries must be submitted to the Contracting Authority by email at the contact address provided. Written responses from the Contracting Authority must be received at least five (5) days before the closing date to allow adequate time for a response.

#### Additional Information

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
* **Trade Agreement:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Delivery Regions:** Canada

The tender is for a non-securitizable procurement under the Canadian Crown. The bidders should refer to CanadaBuys.ca for further information and the bid submission procedure.

The deadline for bid submission has expired. However, all specialised ammunition tender submissions will be taken into consideration going forward. Contact for the latest news regarding updates in specialized tender opportunities. \---==-01
======================================
